alert.note: Alert for Crook; Weston (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 20 at 9:24PM MDT until June 20 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Weston County in northeastern Wyoming... Southeastern Crook County in northeastern Wyoming... * Until 1000 PM MDT. * At 924 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles west of Osage, or 17 miles northwest of Newcastle, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Osage around 930 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Four Corners, Buckhorn and Mallo Camp. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
